title: [GAMEPLAY] Kalista does not show up in champ store with any filters marked
body: Basically, Kalista doesn't appear in the champ store when I have any filters checked.  I do not know, at this time, what other champs are affected by this.

replies.body:
Hey DashOfChaos! 

Thanks for the report! We'll get this fixed and see if any other champions are affected.
Now if only her passive indicator worked then every thing would be fantastic.
Now if only her passive indicator worked then every thing would be fantastic.
